p: Plasmids inserted with wild and mutated three prime untranslated region (3′-UTR) of AQP2 were constructed for dual-luciferase reporter assay of the binding between miR-34b-5p and AQP2 ( Figure 4(A)). Luciferase activities of the mimic + mut-AQP2 group, mimic NC + mut-AQP2 group, and mimic NC + wt-AQP2 group had no significant differences. The mimic + wt-AQP2 group obtained a significantly reduced luciferase activity ( Figure 4(B), p < 0.01, vs the mimic NC + wt-AQP2 group). qRT-PCR and Western blotting were applied to detect the expression of AQP2 in LPS-induced HK-2 cells after transfection with miR-34b-5p inhibitor or miR-34b-5p mimic. AQP2 was up-regulated in the LPS + inhibitor group while down-regulated in the LPS + mimic group ( Figure 4(C,D), p < 0.05), indicating that miR-34b-5p negatively regulated AQP2 in HK-2 cells.
